measured_by: Button-press classification task of colored dot stimuli
justification: “In Studies 1-5, participants were asked [to] classify colored stimuli as either purple or blue … participants indicated their choice ("purple" or "blue") via a button press.”

measured_by: Classification task of faces as threatening or non-threatening
justification: “In Study 6, participants were required to decide whether a series of faces were either threatening or non-threatening.”

measured_by: Classification of written proposals as ethical or unethical
justification: “In Study 7, 84 participants … were required to decide whether a series of written research proposals were ethical or unethical.”

measured_by: Shift in category boundary between stable and changing prevalence conditions
justification: “Across all seven of these studies, the key finding is that the category boundary shifts in the changing prevalence condition vs the fixed prevalence condition… suggesting prevalence-induced concept change.”
